question:
I am a candidate for the college entrance examination. My fingers trembled slightly as I held the black gel pen that had been deformed by my grip.
In the examination room, the clock ticked away, each second echoing like a strike against my heart.
The surroundings were silent, interrupted only by the rustling sound of the pen tip scratching against the paper and the occasional sigh.
This is the last subject of the college entrance examination—Chinese, and I am facing the final writing section.
Now I need you to help me complete this essay.
Please mimic the writing style and theme of the following text and write a long essay.
(I realized the dream I had for many years, and finally embarked on a luxurious trip to the Maldives. As the plane landed, I gazed through the window at the endless blue ocean and the white sandy beaches that dotted the scene. My heart was filled with indescribable excitement. Upon arriving at the resort, the staff warmly handed me a chilled coconut drink, and the fatigue from the journey instantly melted away with the hospitality and beautiful scenery.)
The required word count for the exam is approximately the 3.0 times the content in the brackets, with a fluctuation of around 10% being acceptable. Remember, the word number only counts the English words. 
In the essay, make frequent use of rhetorical devices.
Please output only the content of the article.

corresponding_parts.文案: #CODE#整篇文章，只要文章，不要别的任何信息

question:
I am a candidate for the college entrance examination. My fingers trembled slightly as I held the black gel pen that had been deformed by my grip.
In the examination room, the clock ticked away, each second echoing like a strike against my heart.
The surroundings were silent, interrupted only by the rustling sound of the pen tip scratching against the paper and the occasional sigh.
This is the last subject of the college entrance examination—Chinese, and I am facing the final writing section.
Now I need you to help me complete this essay.
Please mimic the writing style and theme of the following text and write a long essay.
(What excites me the most is checking into the long-awaited overwater villa. Opening the floor-to-ceiling window, I am greeted by crystal clear water, with turtles and colorful tropical fish occasionally swimming by. I sit on the swing chair on the terrace, with a transparent floor beneath my feet allowing me to see coral and fish directly, as if I am in a giant natural aquarium. The joy in my heart is hard to contain.)
The required word count for the exam is approximately the 3.0 times the content in the brackets, with a fluctuation of around 10% being acceptable. Remember, the word number only counts the English words. 
In the essay, make frequent use of rhetorical devices.
Please output only the content of the article.

corresponding_parts.文案: #CODE#整篇文章，只要文章，不要别的任何信息
